# Allow crawling of html, md, xml, and txt only
User-agent: *
Disallow: *.svg$
Disallow: *.jpg$
Disallow: *.ico$
Disallow: *.json$
Disallow: *.mjs$
Disallow: *.js$
Disallow: /css
Disallow: /js
